    • Field Detail

      • MIN_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final int MIN_CACHE_SIZE
        Minimum size of memory which may be allocated by cache (in pages). This parameter is used only if related flag is set in constrictor of cache.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CACHE_STATE_FILE

        public static final String CACHE_STATE_FILE
        File which contains stored state of disk cache after storage close.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CACHE_STATISTIC_FILE_EXTENSION

        public static final String CACHE_STATISTIC_FILE_EXTENSION
        Extension for file which contains stored state of disk cache after storage close.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • O2QCache

        public O2QCache(long readCacheMaxMemory,
                int pageSize,
                boolean checkMinSize,
                int percentOfPinnedPages,
                boolean printCacheStatistics,
                int cacheStatisticsInterval)
        Parameters:
        readCacheMaxMemory - Maximum amount of direct memory which can allocated by disk cache in bytes.
        pageSize - Cache page size in bytes.
        checkMinSize - If this flat is set size of cache may be MIN_CACHE_SIZE or bigger.
        percentOfPinnedPages - Maximum percent of pinned pages which may be hold by this cache.
        See Also:
        MAX_PERCENT_OF_PINED_PAGES

      • silentLoadForRead

        public OCacheEntry silentLoadForRead(long fileId,
                                     int pageIndex,
                                     OWriteCache writeCache,
                                     boolean verifyChecksums)
        Description copied from interface: OReadCache
        Loads page from the disk cache if it is already loaded otherwise loads it from disk but does not put it the disk cache. In some scenarios usage of this method can lead to concurrency issues so please use it carefully.
        Specified by:
        silentLoadForRead in interface OReadCache

      • changeMaximumAmountOfMemory

        public void changeMaximumAmountOfMemory(long readCacheMaxMemory)
                                 throws IllegalStateException
        Changes amount of memory which may be used by given cache. This method may consume many resources if amount of memory provided in parameter is much less than current amount of memory.
        Specified by:
        changeMaximumAmountOfMemory in interface OReadCache
        Parameters:
        readCacheMaxMemory - New maximum size of cache in bytes.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - In case of new size of disk cache is too small to hold existing pinned pages.

      • closeStorage

        public final void closeStorage(OWriteCache writeCache)
                        throws IOException
        Performs following steps:
        1. If flag OGlobalConfiguration.STORAGE_KEEP_DISK_CACHE_STATE is set to true saves state of all queues of 2Q cache into file CACHE_STATE_FILE.The only exception is pinned pages they need to pinned again.
        2. Closes all files and flushes all data associated to them.
        Specified by:
        closeStorage in interface OReadCache
        Parameters:
        writeCache - Write cache all files of which should be closed. In terms of cache write cache = storage.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadCacheState

        public final void loadCacheState(OWriteCache writeCache)
        Loads state of 2Q cache queues stored during storage close closeStorage(OWriteCache) back into memory if flag OGlobalConfiguration.STORAGE_KEEP_DISK_CACHE_STATE is set to true. If maximum size of cache was decreased cache state will not be restored.
        Specified by:
        loadCacheState in interface OReadCache
        Parameters:
        writeCache - Write cache is used to load pages back into cache if needed.
        See Also:
        closeStorage(OWriteCache)

      • storeCacheState

        public final void storeCacheState(OWriteCache writeCache)
        Stores state of queues of 2Q cache inside of CACHE_STATE_FILE file if flag OGlobalConfiguration.STORAGE_KEEP_DISK_CACHE_STATE is set to true. Following format is used to store queue state:
        1. Max cache size, single item (long)
        2. File id or -1 if end of queue is reached (int)
        3. Page index (long), is absent if end of the queue is reached
        Specified by:
        storeCacheState in interface OReadCache
        Parameters:
        writeCache - Write cache which manages files cache state of which is going to be stored.

      • deleteStorage

        public final void deleteStorage(OWriteCache writeCache)
                         throws IOException
        Specified by:
        deleteStorage in interface OReadCache
        Throws:
        IOException

        Specified by:
